characters2.name: Phillip
characters2.post: A small black goat with a devilish disposition. Phillip is most comfortable acting as the group’s hacker and demolitions specialist.

characters2.name: Itsa Winnerbaby
characters2.post: A former racehorse who hasn’t yet accepted that he is long past his prime. Itsa is the muscle and the getaway expert.

characters2.name: Ruthie
characters2.post: A sweet, caring grandma hen… with a gun, an extensive criminal history and abounding love in her heart. Ruthie is strangely comfortable committing various felonies.
